description.value:
This is an assortment of furnishings and comfortable decor for the bedroom., which includes vanities, wardrobes, and a bed. This provides an improved and deluxe set of bedroom furniture for 4 bedrooms. This includes additional fixtures such as lamps, time pieces, improved clothing storage and even equipment lockers. Using modern day technology, sleep and getting started for the day has never been easier!

It confers the benefits of 8 hours of sleep in 6 hours. In addition, the time it takes to gather equipment, donning and doffing armor is halved. In addition, it grants you use of a selection of clothing and cosmetics, which includes a +1 item bonus to Deception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.AJstokjdG6iDjVjE]{Impersonate} or Diplomacy checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{Make an Impression} for the next social function you go to, as if you were using an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.IRqbsE8MgGLTfHLz]{Disguise Kit (Elite Cosmetics)} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.rXZxM7SbqEnvXyal]{Clothing (High-Fashion Fine)}, or a +1 circumstance bonus if you already have an item bonus.
